title: September 01, 2024 — New Snowflake region | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
We are pleased to announce the general availability of the following region, which was previously introduced as a preview
in June 2024:
The China region is a separate region operated by Digital China Cloud Technology Limited (DCC), an authorized operating partner of Snowflake, Inc.

The China region supports all Snowflake Editions. To create an initial account in the region, please contact
DCC.

For more information about the region, see Asia Pacific & China (in Supported Cloud Regions) or visit the
Snowflake China website.

Customers with existing Snowflake accounts are not able to access resources in the China region, and vice versa. Some features may
not be available in the China region.
